control.datasource: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(a.id) =0 THEN '' WHEN COUNT(a.id) >0 THEN 'red' END as 'color', COUNT(a.id) as 'cantidad' FROM PAPERLESS_ASIGNACION A WHERE A.FechaAceptacionUsr1 is null AND A.IdEstado =3 AND datediff(minute,FechaPaso3,getdate())>30

detail.datasourse: SELECT I.NumConsolidado, FechaMaster, C.Descripcion as 'Agente', D.Descripcion as 'Naviera', E.Descripcion as 'Nave', A.NumHousesBL as 'Cant. Houses/BLs', Viaje, convert(varchar(20),FechaPaso3,113) as 'Fecha Asignacion', convert(varchar(20),getdate(),113) as 'Actual', --cast(DateDiff(day, fechapaso3, getdate()) as varchar) + ':' + convert(nvarchar(5),dateadd(minute,Datediff(minute,FechaPaso3,getdate()),0),8) as Tiempo, cast((Datediff(minute,fechaPaso3,getdate())/1440) as varchar) + ':' + convert(nvarchar(5),dateadd(minute,Datediff(minute,fechaPaso3,getdate()),0),8) as Tiempo, g.NombreUsuario as 'usuario1', F.Descripcion as 'Estado' FROM PAPERLESS_ASIGNACION A LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_AGENTE C ON A.IdAgente=C.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_NAVIERA D ON A.IdNaviera = D.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_NAVE E ON A.IdNave = E.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_ESTADO F ON A.IdEstado = F.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN USUARIOS G ON A.Usuario1 = G.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN USUARIOS H ON A.Usuario2 = H.Id LEFT OUTER JOIN PAPERLESS_USUARIO1_HOUSESBL_INFO I ON A.Id = I.IdAsignacion WHERE A.FechaAceptacionUsr1 is null AND A.IdEstado =3 AND datediff(minute,FechaPaso3,getdate())>30
